name: ClearAnimations
notes: ClearAnimations doesn't do anything when the animation ends if we pass 1 for the freeze parameter in ApplyAnimation.
tips: Unlike some other ways to remove player from a vehicle, this will also reset the vehicle's velocity to zero, instantly stopping the car. Player will appear on top of the vehicle with the same location as he was in his car seat.
description: Clears all animations for the given player (it also cancels all current tasks such as jetpacking,parachuting,entering vehicles, driving (removes player out of vehicle), swimming, etc.. ).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to clear the animations of.

params_body.name: forcesync
params_body.description: Set to 1 to force playerid to sync the animation with other players in streaming radius (optional)

return_values: This function always returns 1, even when the player specified is not connected.
related_fn: ApplyAnimation: Apply an animation to a player.
